name: Dead Close
description:
JOIN THE DISCORD FOR UPDATES AND OTHER INFO!

https://discord.gg/UZ62hPX

Dead Close is a first person shooter with a zombie theme.  As of now, the objective is to find the supply crate and turn on all generators.  Then head back to the red zone to win.  The game is in pre alpha, so expect bugs.  Please post any bugs you get in the comments, AND post things you'd like to see.  I want this to be somewhat community driven.  Keep in mind, this is my first game and I have ALOT to learn.  Thanks for playing, and thanks for your feedback!

P.S  You can donate if you want, but I don't expect it, since this is my first game, the project could easily fall apart.  I do appreciate any donations given, but much prefer quality feedback!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

HOW TO PLAY:

W,A,S,D for movement.

LEFT MOUSE CLICK to Shoot

R to reload weapon

E to interact with generators and pick up the supply crate

SHIFT to sprint

SPACE BAR to jump

ZOMBIES MUST BE SHOT IN THE HEAD TO BE KILLED

If you die, or win, a menu will pop up to go to the main menu.  Push escape to get access to the mouse.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The game is made independently by developer DaniTheKid.  It's intention is to be a learning tool for the dev's journey through game design.  It is DaniTheKid's first playable game.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CREDITS

Music:

Haunted from http://www.purple-planet.com

Alcoholic Blues from http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Vernon_Dalhart/Antique_Phonograph_Music_Progra...
